text: Max Havelaar () is a 1976 Dutch Indonesian drama movie directed by Fons Rademakers and was based on the 1860 novel of the same name by Multatuli. It stars Peter Faber, Rima Melati, Rutger Hauer, Sacha Bulthuis, Joop Admiraal, Herry Lantho, Leo Beyers. ==Other websites== * Category:1976 drama movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:Indonesian movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Fons Rademakers
title: Max Havelaar (movie)
